underlying_goal: Improve project onboarding and usage by updating the README to reflect its opinionated, research-focused nature, documenting the multi-AI-assistant setup, and creating a new 'clear-writing' skill to codify writing style preferences.
primary_success: Created a comprehensive 'clear-writing' skill based on the user's specified authors and examples, and iteratively refined it with real-time feedback. Also reverse-engineered and documented the multi-AI-assistant setup.
brief_summary: User requested a major documentation update and a new skill. Claude updated the README to frame the project as 'highly-opinionated' and for research, documented the Claude/Codex/Gemini setup, and created a new 'clear-writing' skill with user-specified references. The skill was iteratively improved with user feedback before all changes were committed.
